description:
Team Urameshi must face Team Masho, but a scheme by the team’s owner ensnares Hiei and the Masked Fighter before the fight! With Kuwabara injured, Yusuke and Kurama will have to take this entire team alone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`équipe de Masho, les ninjas des Ténèbres
闇の忍・魔性使いチーム
